entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bathurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bathurst Airport 6:25 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: NE 26 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain or ice pellets this evening then to snow near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
